scripts.build: npm install && node script/barrelize.js && node script/generate-version.js && npm run tsc:src && npm run tsc:guides && npm run copy
scripts.build:release: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run check && npm run doc && npm run test:retry
scripts.build:publish: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run check && npm run doc && npm run test:retry
scripts.test:fast: cross-env TS_NODE_CACHE=false nyc mocha -r esm -rv ts-node/register "test/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:retry: (npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast)
scripts.test:integration: cd ./integration/js && npm run test && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-audio: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- audio && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-video: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- video && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-meeting-end: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- meeting_end && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-screen-share: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- screen_share && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-content-share: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- content_share && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-data-message: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- data_message && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
scripts.test:integration-meeting-readiness-check: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- meeting_readiness_checker && npm run upload-logs-to-s3
